snippet: John Galliano, the disgraced British fashion designer, is making a tentative return after his racist tirade. Lance Armstrong, the fallen cyclist, sat down with Oprah Winfrey to confess, in part to prepare his comeback. Will the public forgive and...
abstract: John Galliano, the disgraced British fashion designer, is making a tentative return after his racist tirade. Lance Armstrong, the fallen cyclist, sat down with Oprah Winfrey to confess, in part to prepare his comeback. Will the public forgive and forget?

headline.main: Can Armstrong Be Redeemed? How About Galliano?
